name: Wolfenstein 1.02 Demo Movie File
summary: Recording of a game played in Return to Castle Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory (v. 1.02), a first-person 3D action game; records the gameplay of a mission and can be played back later using the program's "Replays" option.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
